graph.original_query: Create a professional one-page (index.html) dark-themed (Black and White only) portfolio website for a Software Hacker using Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css (for scroll-in section reveals and CTA hover transitions), and Splide.js (for a testimonial carousel and horizontally scrolling image gallery); use CDN only (no build tools); apply a sleek black/charcoal base, warm beige/muted orange accents, elegant typography, refined spacing, subtle transitions (no glows/neons); include sticky header with anchor links, hero section with fullscreen image (https://picsum.photos/1600/900?blur=1), category highlight cards (https://picsum.photos/400/600?grayscale/random=1), animated counters (clients, projects, years), About (mission, timeline), Gallery or Services grid (6–8 projects), Contact form (name/email/message), and footer with social icons; keep layout responsive and professional, with no lorem ipsum, real readable text, and pure HTML/CSS/JS; Use CoderAgent in 9–10 precise updates (meta, header, hero, counters, cards, timeline, gallery, testimonial slider, contact form, layout cleanup), and finally audit spacing, contrast, and visual balance to ensure premium Software Hacker look. Ask the CoderAgent to update the same index.html, use code to update it if file is longer and make sure old content is not deleted, and only required sections are updated. Remind CoderAgent to update the placeholders (not overwrite whole file) but remember, it can write upto 3000 words at each call, so it can do a lot in a single call.

T001.initial_thoughts: I need to create a basic HTML structure for a one-page portfolio website, including CDN links for Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css, and Splide.js. The structure should include placeholders for different sections and a dark theme. Since this is a new file creation, I will use the direct file creation method.

files.index.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <!-- META_PLACEHOLDER -->
    <title>Portfolio Website</title>

    <!-- Tailwind CSS CDN -->
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tailwindcss@2.2.19/dist/tailwind.min.css" rel="stylesheet">

    <!-- Flowbite CSS CDN -->
    <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.2.1/flowbite.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />

    <!-- Animate.css CDN -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/animate.css/4.1.1/animate.min.css"/>

    <!-- Splide.js CSS CDN -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@splidejs/splide@4.1.4/dist/css/splide.min.css">

    <style>
        /* Dark Theme Styles */
        body {
            background-color: #000;
            color: #fff;
        }

        /* Add custom styles here */
    </style>
</head>
<body class="bg-black text-white">

    <!-- Header -->
    <header>
        <!-- HEADER_PLACEHOLDER -->
    </header>

    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <section id="hero" class="py-16">
        <!-- HERO_PLACEHOLDER -->
    </section>

    <!-- Counters Section -->
    <section id="counters" class="py-16">
        <!-- COUNTERS_PLACEHOLDER -->
    </section>

    <!-- Category Cards Section -->
    <section id="cards" class="py-16">
        <!-- CARDS_PLACEHOLDER -->
    </section>

    <!-- Timeline Section -->
    <section id="timeline" class="py-16">
        <!-- TIMELINE_PLACEHOLDER -->
    </section>

    <!-- Gallery Section -->
    <section id="gallery" class="py-16">
        <!-- GALLERY_PLACEHOLDER -->
    </section>

    <!-- Testimonials Section -->
    <section id="testimonials" class="py-16">
        <!-- TESTIMONIALS_PLACEHOLDER -->
    </section>

    <!-- Contact Section -->
    <section id="contact" class="py-16">
        <!-- CONTACT_PLACEHOLDER -->
    </section>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <footer class="py-8 text-center">
        <!-- FOOTER_PLACEHOLDER -->
    </footer>

    <!-- Flowbite JavaScript CDN -->
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.2.1/flowbite.min.js"></script>

    <!-- Splide.js JavaScript CDN -->
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@splidejs/splide@4.1.4/dist/js/splide.min.js"></script>

    <script>
        // JavaScript for Splide.js (if needed)
        document.addEventListener( 'DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // Example Splide initialization (customize as needed)
            // var splide = new Splide( '.splide' ).mount();
        } );
    </script>
</body>
</html>

T012.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to distill the content of `index.html` from step T011 based on the previous updates. I will provide a bullet point summary of the key sections and functionalities described in the original query and confirmed by the 'updated_section' from T011, focusing on the HTML structure, styling with Tailwind CSS, and dynamic features using JavaScript libraries.

summary_bullets: The `index.html` file is a one-page portfolio website designed for a Software Hacker.
It features a dark theme (black and white) using Tailwind CSS.
Utilizes Flowbite for UI components and Animate.css for scroll-in section reveals and CTA hover transitions.
Includes a Splide.js-powered testimonial carousel and horizontally scrolling image gallery.
The website has a sticky header with anchor links for easy navigation.
A hero section features a fullscreen image.
Category highlight cards are included to showcase different areas of expertise.
Animated counters display key metrics like clients, projects, and years of experience.
The 'About' section highlights the mission and timeline of the Software Hacker.
A Gallery or Services grid showcases 6–8 projects.
A Contact form allows visitors to send messages.
The footer contains social media icons for easy connection.
The layout is responsive to ensure optimal viewing on different devices.
The design prioritizes a sleek, professional look with refined spacing and subtle transitions.

limitations: The actual HTML file content was not directly provided, so the summary is based on the original request and the 'updated_section' from the previous step.
recommendations: For a more accurate summary, the actual `index.html` content should be provided.

Include necessary CDN links for Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css, and Splide.js. Also set up the basic styling with a dark theme.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a basic HTML structure for a one-page portfolio website. Use Tailwind CSS for styling. Include CDN links for Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css, and Splide.js. Set up a dark theme (black and white only). Use placeholders (<!-- META_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- HEADER_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- HERO_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- COUNTERS_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- CARDS_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- TIMELINE_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- GALLERY_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- TESTIMONIALS_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- CONTACT_PLACEHOLDER -->, <!-- FOOTER_PLACEHOLDER -->) for meta tags, header, hero section, counters, category cards, timeline, gallery, testimonial slider, contact form, and footer. Ensure that the layout is responsive and professional, but do not add any real text except for section headings. Use comments to explain the code.
